2. Vehicle requirements: Make/brand, model, type (sedan/SUV/pickup), year, color, quantity needed, and budget range.
3. Any special requirements: Financing preferences, trade-in details, delivery timeline, or custom features.

Once I have this information, I can create the quotation for you.
